numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The graph displays racial disparity in different major sport leagues.
3. The graph shows players of color in red.
4. The graph shows head coaches of color in pink.
5. One graph shows the Women's National Basketball Association.
6. The other graphs show national sports associations for men.
7. I wonder why the graph includes only the Women's National Basketball Association as a women's league.
8. I wonder why there are more players of color than coaches of color.
10. This graph suggests that national teams in the country should have more diverse coaches.
11. Players of color and aspiring players of color should have role models.
12. A diverse coach can be a role model for a player of color.
13. The headline is: Players vs Coaches of Color in Major League Sports.
